**Ready to play? Let’s Pong!**

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Why We Love Pong
sections.name: About section
sections.label: About
sections.content:
### Our Mission  
At 'I Need a Pong Game', we aim to bring back the joy of one of the world's first video games—Pong. Our passion is to reintroduce this classic in a new, exciting format that captivates both old-school gamers and a new generation.  

We believe in simple, yet timeless entertainment. Whether you are a seasoned player or a newbie, Pong offers a unique experience of competition and fun.

sections.label: Services
sections.content:
### Explore Our Offerings  
- **Online Pong Tournaments**: Compete with players around the world in our organized tournaments with exciting prizes.
- **Customizable Gameplay**: Alter paddle sizes, ball speed, and background themes to suit your play style.
- **Pong-on-the-Go**: Enjoy our mobile app version to play anywhere, anytime.

Join our community and elevate your Pong skills today!

sections.title: Got Questions? We've Got Answers
sections.name: FAQ section
sections.label: FAQ
sections.content:
### Frequently Asked Questions  
**Q: How can I download the game?**  
A: Simply visit our website and click the download link to get started on PC, Mac, or mobile.

**Q: Is multiplayer available?**  
A: Yes, you can play against friends online or join our community to find opponents.

**Q: Can I participate in tournaments for free?**  
A: Yes, registration for our monthly Pong Tournaments is free for all users.
